titles.title: Hosanna Hosanna - Blessed is the Son of David

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hosanna! Hosanna!
Blessed is the Son of David
Hosanna! Hosanna!
That cometh in the name of the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Behold!
Thy King
has come unto thee
Behold!
Thy King
He reigns forevermore!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Behold!
we shall reign with Him
if we endure
Behold!
we shall reign with Him
if we endure

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Behold the Lamb of God
Oh come let us adore
Behold the Lamb of God
O come let us adore

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Behold!
the King of Kings
Come worship Him in awe
Behold!
the King of Kings
Come worship Him in awe
